description: Produces classification priors based on voxel signatures.

sigs.title: Signatures dataset
sigs.description: Signatures dataset. A dataset with F features per voxel.

tdist.title: Training results
tdist.description: Training results. This file is generated by 3dSignatures.

labeltable.title: Labeltable
labeltable.description: Labeltable to attach to output dataset

do.title: Output type
do.description: Specify the output that this program should create.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Specify root prefix for output volumes.

cmask.title: Cmask expression
cmask.description: Provide cmask expression. Voxels where expression is 0 are excluded from computations.

mrange.title: Mask range
mrange.description: Consider MASK only for values between M0 and M1, inclusive.

vox_debug.title: Voxel debug
vox_debug.description: 1D index or 3D indices (I J K) of voxel to debug.

vox_debug_file.title: Voxel debug file
vox_debug_file.description: File in which debug information is output

uid.title: User ID
uid.description: User identifier string. Used to generate names for temporary files.

use_tmp.title: Use temporary storage
use_tmp.description: Use temporary storage to speed up the program

pset.title: Probability set
pset.description: Reuse probability output from an earlier run.

cset.title: Classification set
cset.description: Reuse classification output from an earlier run.

regroup_classes.title: Regroup classes
regroup_classes.description: Regroup classes into parent classes. Requires naming the original classes as C1.*, C2.*, etc.

features.title: Features
features.description: Use these features only. Otherwise, all features in the signature file will be used.

show_this_dist.title: Show distribution
show_this_dist.description: Show information obtained from the training data about the distribution of DIST. Set DIST to ALL to see all distributions.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Use OpenMPized routines for faster performance.
